ROOT.GetDBlineInfo1: select a. id,a.start_st_id as st_id,0 as st_type,a.type,a.url,b.longitude,b.latitude ,a.points,a.width from ys_db.ysh_drawline_info a join ys_db.ysh_drawstation_info b on a.start_st_id=b.id where a.type=2 union select a. id,a.end_st_id as st_id,1 as st_type,a.type,a.url,b.longitude,b.latitude ,a.points,a.width from ys_db.ysh_drawline_info a join ys_db.ysh_drawstation_info b on a.end_st_id=b.id where a.type=2 union select a. id,a.end_st_id as st_id,1 as st_type,a.type,a.url,0 as longitude,0 as latitude ,a.points,a.width from ys_db.ysh_drawline_info a where a.type!=2
ROOT.GetDBlineInfo: select a. id,a.start_st_id as st_id,0 as st_type,a.type,a.url,b.longitude,b.latitude ,a.points,a.width from ys_db.ysh_drawline_info a join ys_db.ysh_drawstation_info b on a.start_st_id=b.id union select a. id,a.end_st_id as st_id,1 as st_type,a.type,a.url,b.longitude,b.latitude ,a.points,a.width from ys_db.ysh_drawline_info a join ys_db.ysh_drawstation_info b on a.end_st_id=b.id union select a. id,a.end_st_id as st_id,1 as st_type,a.type,a.url,0 as longitude,0 as latitude ,a.points,a.width from ys_db.ysh_drawline_info a where a.end_st_id is null and a.start_st_id is null
